quotes.quote: His palms are sweaty, knees weak, arms are heavy, there's vomit on his sweater already, mom's spaghetti
God only know he's grown farther from home, he's no father, he goes home and barely knows his own daughter
When I'm gone, but I'm tryin' to give you the life that I never had
Daddy's always on the move, Mama's always on the news
Now hush, little baby, don't you cry everything's gonna be alright
Music is like magic, there's a certain feelin' you get
'Til the roof comes off, 'til the lights go out
Dear Slim, I wrote you, but you still ain't callin'
My girlfriend's jealous 'cause I talk about you 24/7 but she don't know you like I know you, Slim, no one does
